word_mean: 外渗：排出或逸出，如血液从血管进入组织
外渗物：外渗的血液或其他物质

sentence.Network_en: The BBB permeability was reflected by Evan's blue ( EB ) extravasation.
sentence.Network_cn: 用Evan’sblue ( EB ) 测定BBB的通透性.

sentence.Network_en: Change of brain edema was analyzed by Evans blue extravasation and brain water content.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过观察Evans蓝扩散距离、脑组织含水量的不同两项指标来观察脑水肿程度.

sentence.Network_en: Extravasation of antineoplastic agents is one of the most common complications of chemotherapy.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗肿瘤药外渗是化疗过程中的常见并发症之一.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1.高血压2.血管外渗（extravasation）药液漏出血管外，可引起局部缺血坏死。3.剂量过大，引起肾血流量显著减少，产生少尿或无尿。。.

means.word_mean: 1. an extravasated liquid (blood or lymph or urine); the product of extravasation
2. (of volcanos) pouring out fumes or lava (or a deposit so formed)
3. the process of exuding or passing out of a vessel into surrounding tissues; said or blood or lymph or urine
